title: Plan For Grand Jury Verdict Lacked Follow-Through, Critics Say
teaser: Missouri Governor Jay Nixon called in more member of the National Guard on Monday, after some protests in Ferguson turned violent.
contentencoded:
Missouri Governor Jay Nixon called in more member of the National Guard on Monday, after some protests in Ferguson turned violent. The move follows criticism that after months of planning, he should have been better prepared to deploy guardsmen to stop looting and vandalism following a grand jury's decision not to indict the officer in the Michael Brown shooting death.
